Single Pole Toggle Switches.definition: Single pole traditional toggle style switches with flip-style actuators for basic on/off lighting control, e.g. standard toggle switches, grounding toggle switches, illuminated toggle switches, heavy duty toggle switches

Single Pole Rocker Switches.definition: Single pole decorator/rocker style switches with paddle-style actuators for basic on/off lighting control, e.g. standard single pole rocker switches, decorator paddle switches, illuminated rocker switches

Three Way Toggle Switches.definition: Three-way traditional toggle style switches for multi-location control from two different locations, e.g. three-way toggle switches

Three Way Rocker Switches.definition: Three-way decorator/rocker style switches for multi-location control from two different locations, e.g. three-way rocker switches, three-way decorator switches

Four Way Toggle Switches.definition: Four-way traditional toggle style switches for multi-location control from three or more locations, e.g. four-way toggle switches

Four Way Rocker Switches.definition: Four-way decorator/rocker style switches for multi-location control from three or more locations, e.g. four-way rocker switches, four-way decorator switches

Multi Function Combination Switches.definition: Switches that combine multiple switching functions or integrate switch with outlet in a single device, e.g. duplex rocker switches, combination decorator switches, dual switches, switch outlet combinations, multi-function switches

High Amperage Rocker Switches.definition: Rocker switches rated for 20 amp or higher current loads for heavy duty applications, e.g. 20 amp rocker switches, commercial grade high current switches

Motion Sensor Switches.definition: Switches with built-in motion detection sensors for automatic operation based on occupancy, e.g. motion sensor switches, occupancy sensor switches

Illuminated Indicator Switches.definition: Switches with built-in LED indicators or pilot lights for visual status indication, e.g. LED illuminated switches, pilot light switches

Smart Connected Switches.definition: WiFi or wireless enabled switches that can be controlled remotely via smartphone apps, voice assistants, or home automation systems, e.g. smart light switches, connected switches, WiFi switches, smart home switches, app controlled switches

Wireless Remote Control Switches.definition: RF remote controlled switches without hardwired connections for wireless operation, e.g. wireless remote switches, RF controlled switches

Single Pole Toggle Switches.definition: Single pole switches with toggle-style actuators for basic on/off control, e.g. toggle framed switches, illuminated toggle switches, grounding toggle switches

Single Pole Rocker Switches.definition: Single pole switches with paddle/rocker-style actuators for basic on/off control, e.g. decorator rocker switches, paddle switches, illuminated rocker switches

Three Way Switches.definition: Switches designed for three-way electrical configurations allowing control from multiple locations, e.g. three-way toggle switches, three-way rocker switches, three-way decorator switches

Smart WiFi Switches.definition: Internet-connected switches controllable via smartphone apps and voice assistants, e.g. WiFi light switches, app-controlled switches, voice-activated switches

Wireless Remote Switches.definition: Switches operated via radio frequency remote control without hardwired connections, e.g. RF remote switches, wireless switch kits, battery-operated remote switches

Smart Hub Switches.definition: Smart switches requiring separate hub devices for connectivity and automation, e.g. Z-Wave switches, hub-dependent smart switches, protocol-based switches

Double Rocker Switches.definition: Switches with dual independent rocker controls in single housing for controlling two separate circuits, e.g. dual paddle switches, double decorator switches, twin rocker switches

Specialty Function Switches.definition: Switches with integrated sensors or specialized control functions beyond basic switching, e.g. humidity sensor switches, timer switches, motion sensor switches
